Title: Prohibits the sale of kratom to individuals under the age of twenty-one
Summary: Prohibits the sale of kratom to individuals under the age of twenty-one; imposes a civil penalty of not more than five hundred dollars for the sale or provision of kratom to any person under the age of twenty-one.
LawCode: Amd Art 13-F Art Head, ยง1399-aa, add Art 13-F ยง1399-mmm, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the prohibition of the sale of kratom to individuals under the age of twenty-one
